registration.title: F1 Fantasy Registration
registration.subtitle: Registration
registration.winPrizeFund: Win a share of the prize fund
registration.cardDataProtected: Your card data is protected by encryption. We never see or store your card details.

payment.title: Payment
payment.cashInfoDescription: Choose the date by which you will deliver the payment of €10. Your registration will be confirmed after receiving the payment.
payment.cashConfirmation: I confirm that I will deliver the payment of
payment.cashDeliveryDateRequired: You must select a delivery date
payment.cashConfirmationRequired: You must confirm that you will deliver the payment

success.title: Registration Confirmed!
success.message: You have successfully registered for the F1 Fantasy League 2026. Payment has been received and your registration is active.
success.emailInstructions: Once the system confirms your payment, you will receive a league access code at the email address you provided. Use that code to join the league on the official F1 Fantasy platform.
success.emailTiming: The email with the league code arrives within a few minutes after payment confirmation. Check your spam/junk folder if you don't see it.
